languages.text: {n}Лишь сейчас вы замечаете татуировку на его правой руке: символ Адептус Администратум и несколько сомкнутых цепей. Похоже, старик — собственность некого префекта из этого дворца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Лишь сейчас вы замечаете татуировку на его правой руке: символ Адептус Администратум и несколько сомкнутых цепей. Похоже, старик — собственность некого префекта из этого дворца.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Only now do you notice the tattoo on his right hand: the symbol of the Adeptus Administratum and several interlocking chains. It seems this old fellow is the property of a prefect of this palace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лишь сейчас вы замечаете татуировку на его правой руке: символ Адептус Администратум и несколько сомкнутых цепей. Похоже, старик — собственность некого префекта из этого дворца.{/n}

traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}Only now do you notice the tattoo on his right hand: the symbol of the Adeptus Administratum and several interlocking chains. It seems this old fellow is the property of a prefect of this palace.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}Only now do you notice the tattoo on his right hand: the symbol of the Adeptus Administratum and several interlocking chains. It seems this old fellow is the property of a prefect of this palace.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}这个时候，你才注意到他右手上的纹身：上面纹着帝国内政部的印记，还带有几条纵横交错的链子。看来，这个老人是这座宫殿中某位行政官的所有物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only now do you notice the tattoo on his right hand: the symbol of the Adeptus Administratum and several interlocking chains. It seems this old fellow is the property of a prefect of this palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个时候，你才注意到他右手上的纹身：上面纹着帝国内政部的印记，还带有几条纵横交错的链子。看来，这个老人是这座宫殿中某位行政官的所有物。{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Es ahora cuando te fijas en el tatuaje de su mano derecha: el símbolo del Adeptus Administratum y varias cadenas entrelazadas. Parece que este anciano es propiedad de un prefecto del palacio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only now do you notice the tattoo on his right hand: the symbol of the Adeptus Administratum and several interlocking chains. It seems this old fellow is the property of a prefect of this palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ahora cuando te fijas en el tatuaje de su mano derecha: el símbolo del Adeptus Administratum y varias cadenas entrelazadas. Parece que este anciano es propiedad de un prefecto del palacio.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}あなたは今になって老人の右手にタトゥーがあることに気づく。帝国行政局のシンボルと繋ぎ合わさった鎖数本が描かれている。この老人は、行政局宮殿の総監のお抱えのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only now do you notice the tattoo on his right hand: the symbol of the Adeptus Administratum and several interlocking chains. It seems this old fellow is the property of a prefect of this palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは今になって老人の右手にタトゥーがあることに気づく。帝国行政局のシンボルと繋ぎ合わさった鎖数本が描かれている。この老人は、行政局宮殿の総監のお抱えのようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Ce n'est que maintenant que vous remarquez le tatouage sur sa main droite : le sceau de l'Adeptus Administratum flanqué de plusieurs chaînes entremêlées. Apparemment, ce vieillard appartient à l'un des préfets du palais.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only now do you notice the tattoo on his right hand: the symbol of the Adeptus Administratum and several interlocking chains. It seems this old fellow is the property of a prefect of this palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ce n'est que maintenant que vous remarquez le tatouage sur sa main droite : le sceau de l'Adeptus Administratum flanqué de plusieurs chaînes entremêlées. Apparemment, ce vieillard appartient à l'un des préfets du palais.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Erst jetzt bemerkst du das Tattoo auf seiner rechten Hand: das Symbol des Adeptus Administratum und einige ineinander greifende Ketten. Anscheinend ist dieser alte Mann das Eigentum eines Präfekten dieses Palasts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only now do you notice the tattoo on his right hand: the symbol of the Adeptus Administratum and several interlocking chains. It seems this old fellow is the property of a prefect of this palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Erst jetzt bemerkst du das Tattoo auf seiner rechten Hand: das Symbol des Adeptus Administratum und einige ineinander greifende Ketten. Anscheinend ist dieser alte Mann das Eigentum eines Präfekten dieses Palasts.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Adamın sağ elindeki Adeptus Administratum'un sembolü ve iç içe geçmiş zincirlerden oluşan dövmeyi ancak fark ediyorsun. Görünüşe bakılırsa bu ihtiyar, bu saraydaki bir prefektin malı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Only now do you notice the tattoo on his right hand: the symbol of the Adeptus Administratum and several interlocking chains. It seems this old fellow is the property of a prefect of this palace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın sağ elindeki Adeptus Administratum'un sembolü ve iç içe geçmiş zincirlerden oluşan dövmeyi ancak fark ediyorsun. Görünüşe bakılırsa bu ihtiyar, bu saraydaki bir prefektin malı.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan
